message: Dear Friends! Weâ€™re the family of six who one day decided to sell the house and move to the sailing catamaran! We have changed our quiet and predictable everyday way of life to a new alternative lifestyle full of new discoveries, challenging situations, amazing sceneries and lots of fun! Join us at https://sailingmanakai.com and be welcomed aboard our floating home Mana Kai!
name: RubenAlten
